import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

heatmap1_data = pd.pivot_table(df, values='active', 
                     index=['League'], 
                     columns='Season Start')


plt.figure(figsize=(12, 24)) 
plt.title("Seasons per League", fontsize =20)
